items: Start by standing with your feet hip-width apart and your hands in prayer position in front of your chest.
Take a deep breath in and as you exhale, bend your knees and lower your hips down into a squat position.
Keep your back straight and your chest lifted as you hold the pose for a few breaths.
As you inhale, straighten your legs and come back up to standing position with your hands still in prayer position.
Repeat the squatting motion for several repetitions, focusing on your breath and maintaining proper form.
